LanguageData.Miho_Tail_Thought.stages.2.label: Excited enough to wag tail
LanguageData.Miho_Tail_Thought.stages.2.description: It's so exciting! I think I found my aptitude. (wags tail)
LanguageData.MihoNuzzled.stages.0.label: Adorable
LanguageData.MihoNuzzled.stages.0.description: These lesser beings that are no better than me and are loved by humans just because they're cute? I don't accept that.
LanguageData.MihoKilledMyBondedAnimal.label: Personal belongings disposed
LanguageData.MihoBondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.label: Master of {0}
LanguageData.MihoBondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.descript: It feels strange to have such a lowly creature serve me.
LanguageData.MihoBondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.label: Master of {0}
LanguageData.MihoBondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.descript: It feels strange to have such a lowly creature serve me.
LanguageData.MihoNotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.label: {0}Not the master of
LanguageData.MihoNotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.descr: It has nothing to do with me, does it?
LanguageData.MihoNotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.label: {0}Not the master of
LanguageData.MihoNotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.descr: It has nothing to do with me, does it?
LanguageData.MihoAteInariZushi.stages.0.label: Ate Yubu Sushi
LanguageData.MihoAteInariZushi.stages.0.description: I'm in food heaven! It's so good!
LanguageData.NotMihoAteInariZushi.stages.0.label: Ate Yubu Sushi
LanguageData.NotMihoAteInariZushi.stages.0.descriptio: It had a nice light flavor.
